website_summaries.verdict: 15-foot high-visibility straps will take a load of 500 pounds and have a breaking strain of 1,500 pounds. Hooks and loops add versatility.
pros: Resin-coated stainless steel hooks are tough and rust resistant

customer_reviews.title: Awesome straps for the price point.
customer_reviews.text: So recently got a pickup and had to haul a few things around. Sadly had no straps to do so, was thinking of going to my local harbor freight to see what I could get. Instead I jumped on Amazon and found these FORTEM Ratchet Tie Down Straps, I really liked that they not only came with a zip up case but that they also are high visibility green. This worked great and with out issue. 4 1" widespread straps with bar straps as well for 24.99 is a great deal for these. I will recommend these to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: TrkrNerd

customer_reviews.title: Great Set!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these ratchet straps to tie down my kayak to the top of my car. I don’t have a roof rack, so we made one out of pool noodles, and these straps were perfect for keeping them in place. They came packaged nicely, are very sturdy, and I love how the color stands out so that I can see where they are positioned. I’ve taken the kayak long distances to lakes without it budging in the slightest.
customer_reviews.author: Bitsy S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tie-Down Set for a Good Price
customer_reviews.text: My husband thought that I should have gone to Harbor Freight to buy these cheaper. I disagree. I was specifically looking for the plastic-covered parts so that they wouldn't rust and become hard to operate. Nice kit. Handy zippered bag to keep them all together under the back seat of my truck.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Harmony

customer_reviews.title: Great color, seem really sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Love the bright green color on these straps. Perfect for my kayak that hangs so far over on top of my car. With the bright orange kayak and the BRIGHT green straps, no one should bump into me! Nice rubber coated hooks sit well against the car without worry of scratching. With a 500 lb load strength, you can't go wrong with these straps for most of your strapping needs. I haven't contacted the seller because everything's perfect, but I have a feeling if I did, they'd be very responsive. Just a feeling! A+ buying experience. I would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Dnitra

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING CUSTOMER SERVICE!!
customer_reviews.text: ordered 3 sets of ratchet straps and accidentally received bungee cords instead. these things happen at times. once the folks at fortem found out, they were very apologetic and promptly sent me what i had ordered and went above and beyond to make sure i was satisfied. and satisfied i was- great product, well made, easy to use, very sturdy and of course a great color! With a company like this that stands behind their product and devotes itself to the satisfaction of its customers, will definitely order again soon!
customer_reviews.author: Julia C. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: Works great, ended up buying a pair of rhino straps as well and I prefer them over these, but these still work great to hold down a 2017 GSXR1000R ABS in the bed of my truck and trailer after 6 trips of 300 miles each.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Made a difficult job easy.
customer_reviews.text: I had to move a king sized mattress up a narrow flight of stairs so I ordered these straps to fold the mattress. To say they made the job a piece of cake is an understatement. I had an issue with one of the straps where I could not get it to release which was a pain so I reached out to Fortem customer support for help. They sent me a replacement no questions asked. Usually I would deduct a star for a problem like this but I cannot in this case due to how great their customer support handled the issue. I would recommend this product to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Ronan

customer_reviews.title: Bought for moving, worked great
customer_reviews.text: Admittedly I only used them to secure boxes to a dolly, so I can't speak for their actual durability or strength, but I think nylon straps and metal hooks is a fairly simple recipe for ratchet straps. I like the case they come in, I like the color (matches my car), and I like the wrap-around straps so you don't have to do the awkward attempt to clip the hook onto itself after wrapping around a post. Overall a worthwhile purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew B

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to better secure my RV cover through our tough winter. They are good enough for occasional use and I trust them to hold for months without further attention. I would not want to use them when I had to make frequent changes and adjustments. Mechanisms are typical but not as easy to use as those that cost more.
customer_reviews.author: OldDancer

customer_reviews.title: May not be the best choice
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with this product when it arrived promptly. Most all of my Amazon purchases have been good. As you can see from the photo I am not at all happy with the quality of this product. One use one trip and this is the result. The only thing this was holding down was a mattress and box springs not even a heavy item.
customer_reviews.author: loretta wingart

customer_reviews.title: Company needs to UPDATE STOCK PHOTOS! Not everything has plastic buttons/covers
customer_reviews.text: Company needs to UPDATE STOCK PHOTOS! Not everything has plastic buttons/covers. The included “bag” is actually a POP (Point of Purchase) bag not intended to make it past a cash register or travel. These are still a good value but I have chronic arthritis and purchased partly because of the photos with plastic covered release and buckle. One is zinc plated and the other seems wet-painted as opposed to powder coated. The hooks have a thin “Plasti-Dip” which should wear off from rubbing. It’s rare that I say “I should have gotten the $5.99 Harbor Freight version... In this case of almost over 4 times the cost... These are DISPOSABLE and DISAPPOINTING.
customer_reviews.author: ZZZ Accounting Top Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Not trustworthly vendor
customer_reviews.text: Quality is not really there. Wouldn't trust it to strap down my bikes. Pay a little bit more money. The item I purchased was listed as 600 lb load and when I received it, product only show 500 lb load. Manufacturer confirmed in e-mail that it was indeed 600 lb, but now I see that the listing's been updated to 500 lb. Interesting...
customer_reviews.author: K_S2000

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use
customer_reviews.text: Only used these once. It's a ratchet tie down strap. What is there to say? Actually, I like how simple they are to use. There was no problem trying to cinch my load tight enough and no fighting to release it. Never again will I buy those cheap, no-name brand ratchet straps. The four loops made it simple to secure heavy plywood to my roof rack and the cheesy case is convenient as well.
customer_reviews.author: Shrek

customer_reviews.title: The straps themselves are great. In the process of moving and needed something ...
customer_reviews.text: The straps themselves are great. In the process of moving and needed something reasonably priced I a timely manner. After doing some research these seemed the best choice. They are fantastic! The only downside was there was an issue with shipping the correct product and received bungee cords instead of straps. Shortly after receiving the cords I contacted customer service and they rushed me the correct product. They let me keep the cords as well so got 2 great products for the price of one. Definitely would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredible value and it comes in a handy zipper bag to boot!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible value and they come in a handy zipper bag to boot! I bought this set for my truck but am considering buying another set for our Escape and one for our Kia - because you never know when they might come in handy! We had a 4'x8' dog house losing it's framework and were able to cinch it back together tightly and make repairs using these straps - never could have done it without them. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Pixiecat

customer_reviews.title: Nice set, good value, love the loops
customer_reviews.text: The set is a great value. I use these on Subaru roof rack to transport all kinds of things. Works great for light duty. The bright lime green is nice because its easy to find in a dark car. The dual loop straps are an excellent addition. Super useful. If you're deciding between this set and another one that doesn't have the loops, get the loops. Your car's paint will appreciate it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Seeman

customer_reviews.title: Great Straps for the price
customer_reviews.text: Straps and cranks work really well. The loop straps seem a little weak but held out nicely strapping everything down in a moving truck. The straps themselves are way longer that I expected them to be which is nice but it you are not strapping stuff that is packed close together the excess strap material is cumbersome.
customer_reviews.author: RatherDashing

customer_reviews.title: Compact, small but mighty
customer_reviews.text: I am using these for my motorcycle. I rented a U haul trailer and they also try to sell you "straps". Figured I would just purchase my own. They are "perfect" for a 650 pound bike and a short haul. I would not recommend them for anything bigger than my cruiser or extended journeys.....the straps are pretty strong but width wise are pretty narrow. Still Good piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: J1957

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of straps
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of straps. Carry case is a nice touch too. If registered with them upon receipt, their warranty is extended to lifetime as well. The company took the time to reach out to me and personally thank me for my order and remind me of this warranty. This process was very simple too. Provided name, email, and Amazon order number on a one-page form. No hoops. Just ordered some automobile window shades from them to try.
customer_reviews.author: MIKE

customer_reviews.title: Strong colerful units
customer_reviews.text: We bought several boxes of these because of the high rating. They latch very well in the PODs we had delivered for moving our furniture. The length was perfect and we did not even need the extensions. I am getting a third set for our next container.
customer_reviews.author: Steven G.Top Contributor: Lego

customer_reviews.title: What I like the most
customer_reviews.text: What I like the most ? is everything, seriously...from the case , to the small tie off straps, and being a high visibility color, great for night time use with minimal lighting. I love the case as it would be easier to stow under the seat or behind the seat neatly, without having a tangled mess of straps everywhere, or all over the vehicle. straps seem to be high quality sewn together and strong webbing straps as well. thankyou for such a great offer...
customer_reviews.author: Mike B

customer_reviews.title: Solid and strong .. Fine quality.
customer_reviews.text: These worked fine for my project (of anchoring my hot water heater in order to remove the anode rod which requires high torque). I found a small amount of lubrication was needed to allow them to readily reverse (when in the 180 degree position), but they are solid and strong. Hooks are solid; vinyl coating is well done; ratchet mechanism works well, nothing is plastic. The two additional short straps helped also.
customer_reviews.author: Rogers V. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I've never used one of these before so I had to figure out how it works but after my friend showed me, it all made sense! It came just in time as I had to haul a big furniture. Putting the straps and tightening it was a breeze! It was super secure and couldn't be more happy. Great product! It worked amazingly well.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Rongo

customer_reviews.title: Quality wasn’t up to standard
customer_reviews.text: Two of four straps broke on second use. I haul a trailer around regularly. I wasn’t doing anything unusual with these straps; holding down a forty pound machine. The quality wasn’t what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: M. Conner

customer_reviews.title: These do what they are supposed to do. get the 1500 pound variety
customer_reviews.text: If you're reading this, then you already know what these are supposed to do. And they do it well. I use them with the roof rack on my SUV and they are fine. Last weekend I brought home a queen mattress and box spring on the roof, and these worked great at securing them perfectly. These are a replacement for some older and cheaper 500 pound ratchet tie down straps which didn't work even once before they broke. So it's totally worth investing in something better (like this). Otherwise, when you really need them, they'll let you down. The 500 pound variety are just junk.
customer_reviews.author: Atlanta Jack

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because it said had a 1500lb weight limit I deliver bread so I use them to hold the trays in my trailer after loading up today and using these tie downs to secure the load I drove away and when I got to my first stop the tie downs failed cost me 400.00 in damaged bread ... in the trash they go not worth .50 cents they slipped out of the ratcheting handel do to the fact they are very cheaply made
customer_reviews.author: Fumo

customer_reviews.title: Ok Straps
customer_reviews.text: These straps seem light for 1" straps. I have numerous other 1" straps that are thicker (not width but thickness) than these. They should be fine for light duty but I wouldn't trust them for something like a side by side on a trailer. The rap around straps are too short to be of any use except on small diameter pipe. The storage case is cheep plastic and will not last.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my applications & great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, strong, very visible. The soft loop straps add to the flexibility and convenience of securing payloads. Four uses later, one of the leading edges of a hook strap started to fray. Emailed customer service. Amy responded in less than 24hrs. I shared a picture of where it had frayed, and three days later my new strap arrived. So pleased that when something happens, there’s a caring person who is empowered to make things right!
customer_reviews.author: Tri Newbie

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product
customer_reviews.text: Compared to Autozone, Sams Club, Costco $21 set...this product is a joke. Picture to follow backing up my claim
customer_reviews.author: SUMANO

customer_reviews.title: Very affordable tie downs
customer_reviews.text: I used these to secure my motorcycle in the bed of my truck. The straps are not as wide as other ones found at the store but they are very strong and sturdy. The carry case is very convenient and the additional soft straps work great. It's a good value for the quality. I'll be picking up another set of 4 to have as back up.
customer_reviews.author: Tom A.

customer_reviews.title: In the middle
customer_reviews.text: Functional as any strap, was hoping for a bit larger strap. The hooks seem to be a short hook. Not sure about the ratchets. I really mis being able to find more than two vendors with heavy duty without being oversized. I’ll keep looking. I used them to day to tow my mower without a problem, didn’t have that strapped in secure feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Jjs37

customer_reviews.title: Good quality straps/ties. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: These are *very* good. They work exactly as I expect. They’re a good length, longer than I normally need by a long way, but that’s just fine. Be aware that it takes a few tries to get used to unhooking them once they’re tied up. They work fine - it’s you, you just need to practice a few times.
customer_reviews.author: SAD

customer_reviews.title: They are small, but powerful.
customer_reviews.text: I have used 8 of these straps in bad weather to hold down my huge awning from blowing out to the forest gods for over a year. I have used these straps for hauling an ATV and tons of gear. I keep them in my truck for whenever I need them. I have bought 3 sets and all came without any missing pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used for a move in a shipping pod
customer_reviews.text: Bough a few different brands of these straps. They are all very similar. They all did what was expected. I didn't test the break strength, but it held up in our shipping pod move. What I really liked about this brand was the extra soft loops that came with it. Saved time getting them all in place
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely garbage. This product just looks good, functionality wise it’s one of the worst on the market. Save your money and stick to name brand.
customer_reviews.author: Mike ABX

customer_reviews.title: Harder to loosen
customer_reviews.text: These performed well in a cross-country move, but upon unpacking I found them significantly harder to loosen than the other brand I used (Augo, blue set). This might not be an issue for many people, but for me it's a big factor: I have very small hands and some joint pain.
customer_reviews.author: F. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I guess you get what you pay for. I should have known the deal I got on these were too good to be true. The straps were super thin. One of the ratchets even got jammed on first use. They would be okay for light duty use. I would never trust them to hold anything of value or breakable down. Even holding a matress the ratchet kept slipping little by little with the slightest movement.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Thin but good
customer_reviews.text: Not as thick as I thought they’d be. Works well. I did have an incident where one of the straps came loose on the highway and slipped off of the item. However, it may have been user error by not tightening it enough. The green color is pretty sweet too.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Solid, lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: Even though on the smaller side, it was strong and held a 40’ sun shade securely on all 4 corners during a fairly windy day. Always remember to put a piece of tape or use the excess strapping to keep the ratchet mouth closed so it doesnt open by accident.
customer_reviews.author: KStC

customer_reviews.title: Don’t over tighten!
customer_reviews.text: Be very careful not to over tighten the ratchet! You should insert the strap in the slot and then pull the strap to tighten to almost the desired length. Then, only turn the ratchet a few turns to tighten. If you turn the ratchet too much and the strap builds up, it will be almost impossible to release. This should be included in the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight S.

customer_reviews.title: Great straps!
customer_reviews.text: Aweeeesome truck straps, great price for what the quality of the product is. Really great, haven’t tried them on really big cargo, but used these to strap a couple bikes on my bed and they worked great! Highly recommend these, definitely purchasing more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Rene H.

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my dad as a just because gift. He loves them and uses them every day at work. He also likes that the straps are bright so he can find them easier at night when unloading. They are very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: M. Triplett

customer_reviews.title: POS
customer_reviews.text: I used this one time to strap my mower down. I went to take my mower off the trailer and went to I do the ratchet and looked the whole thing was broken off never seen a ratchet strap break like that. Don’t waste your money on this garbage
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Broke a ratchet on the first try
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be an okay strap for the money, but I ended up braking a ratchet on the very first use. I guess I pulled a little too hard and now the ratchet will not engage.
customer_reviews.author: M. Normandin

customer_reviews.title: Great for moving a motorcycle
customer_reviews.text: I used these ratchet tie down strap to move my new triumph tiger motorcycle 800 miles. They performed superbly. The use of the soft straps guaranteed there were no marks left at the loading points. I highly recommend these straps for moving a motorcycle.
customer_reviews.author: Brett R. Yates

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, sturdy, trustworthy! Soft straps are a huge plus!
customer_reviews.text: Made our move from house to house very easy! Straps and Rackets really cranked down for a secure load! Had no issues except with user error with the line bunching up but Had to watch instructional video bc we made the two most common mistakes, (putting the line in on the same side as the crank, and not pulling the slack out first before cranking). BRIGHT GREEN is a plus on the main roads, letting people following you know the load is secure.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy V

customer_reviews.title: Mandatory tool
customer_reviews.text: Low cost strong straps. I use these to secure a UTV in a trailer and these straps are perfect. Long enough for my 12 foot trailer and strong enough to hold my six person vehicle. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: P. Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Having soft straps is an invaluable tool !
customer_reviews.text: I chose these straps for a few reasons, 1 they came in a soft carry case and I really like the color and the rating however with them having 4 soft straps included is awesome, these are great for hauling motorcycles, tying down pipe or other cylindrical objects and the price and service is great too!
customer_reviews.author: karl & Caren Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Tie down straps
customer_reviews.text: One strap broke on first use. Straps are very thin and look and feel cheap. Off to the parts store to get some good ones.
customer_reviews.author: BillD

customer_reviews.title: Good product for price
customer_reviews.text: Worked great to secure a sun sail shade. Seems sturdy and easy to adjust. My only complaint is it doesn't come with clear instructions about which way to put the straps together.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Include The Soft Strap Loops
customer_reviews.text: This kit did NOT come with the 4 soft strap loops as described. This is the primary reason I ordered this particular set. For this reason I would NOT recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfpack

customer_reviews.title: Very handy.
customer_reviews.text: These straps are really nice. They come in a case so they are easy to keep up with and you always know where they are. They are rated for 1500#, not 500# like so many are.
customer_reviews.author: Ron C.

customer_reviews.title: Handy package provides easy storage and transport
customer_reviews.text: Slim but strong. I though they looked light weight, but they performed well. Exactly as described. I used them for long distance move and straps stayed in place. After move, they still look brand new. Handy package provides easy storage and transport. I bought a 2nd set to move my extended family too.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Tomasko

customer_reviews.title: Good value and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: For the money it’s great. Used them for my daughters haul trip back to school and my neighbor’s kid as well. Easy to use and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Great use in my truck
customer_reviews.text: I recently used these to help stabilize a large upright freezer in the bed of my truck to transport to my house. No issues. Great straps! I like that it comes in a carrying case as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jude Chauvin

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to tie down the canoe on top of our car. Worked really well! The bag they came in is handy too to keep everyone organized.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: I would say the only thing i could be negative about is that the straps are a bit narrow. i was expecting a little wider strap.
customer_reviews.author: D. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday use and design, easy to keep organized.
customer_reviews.text: Have not had a chance to use the straps yet, opened package, checked stitching, straps and ratchets - all appear sturdy and capable for all my uses. Great case to keep them in order.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Used them to tie down chairs, cooler, etc on the hitch carriers for the beach trip. Worked fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for me to buy another set.
customer_reviews.text: These look and functions as designed. Sturdy and strong and wanted the particular color. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: kevin m

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Tie Downs
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for tying down furniture, while moving. The added soft loops helped immensely! These work well, seem like they will hold up, and were at an excellent price. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Ben Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Super Straps
customer_reviews.text: Work great and better value. Super strong. I dig the storage case so straps stay organized. Seller is top notch and communication is solid. 100% SATISFIED
customer_reviews.author: LEE MARIER

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Used the straps a couple of times to transport full sheets of 3/4" plywood strapped to a roof top rack. The ratcheting mechanism is solidly built, the straps are both easy to slide within the mechanism and well gripped by it. The handle was comfortable and the release mechanism effective. The product instilled confidence and then tucked away nicely in the supplied nylon carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Del Grosso

customer_reviews.title: First ratchet straps
customer_reviews.text: So, I have never owned ratchet straps before (millennial growing up...). Anyway, there is a nice insert in the front that includes graphical directions. So I was able to figure it out. They helped support and move the muffler under my car while I installed a tow hitch. I like the neon green as an easy to see color in my applications.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Great multi-purpose straps
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these straps to use primarily for loading dirt bikes in a truck bed. Very easy to use and securely hold cargo in place. Ratchets work flawlessly, and the addition of the soft tie-downs is a nice plus
customer_reviews.author: Matt-G

customer_reviews.title: I am counting on these to be sturdy .
customer_reviews.text: I am hoping that this summer will be easy to transport my kayak to and from the water. With the help of these straps.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry L. More

customer_reviews.title: I like everything about this product. Great value!
customer_reviews.text: So, I bought a truck. Figured tie-downs are a necessity. So, I bought the FORTEM Ratchet Tie Down Straps. Bingo, needed them almost right away, had to secure folding chairs for my daughter's wedding setup preview. Worked like a charm. Love these straps! Sorry, for the late review, just didn't want to review until I actually used the straps. Great product, so easy to use. And a reasonable price as well. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: MoneyP

customer_reviews.title: Really glad I went with these
customer_reviews.text: I use them for hauling my motorcycle and kayaks. The loops have come in very handy, I didn't think I'd use them for anything but I use them almost every time I use the straps now. The ratchets are very high quality and I appreciate the storage bag for keeping everything together and neat.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent straps and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The straps shipped quickly and are just as advertised. Very sturdy and easy to use. I especially like that they release easily when you open the ratchet 180 degrees. I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good tie downs
customer_reviews.text: delivered in a timely manner and very neat and tidy in the carrying case. Quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Russ LeMaster

customer_reviews.title: Very usefull
customer_reviews.text: It's good price for this light duty, enough for my pick up truck use to work. If i need more i will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Bing

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to put on a hand truck. Only 2 of the 4 work but I’m moving tomorrow so I can’t return them. The 2 that do work do not operate smoothly like many others that I have. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Adam Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, and great value, even with a carry bag. No issues with them yet using on a utility trailer with furniture and construction material.
customer_reviews.author: Mutt

customer_reviews.title: Very Versatile Tie Downs
customer_reviews.text: I like the extra soft loop straps.This adds a lot of flexibility for securing loads,plus you get 4 straps,making this a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Paul H

customer_reviews.title: Incredible quality/great product
customer_reviews.text: These straps are superb quality. The stitching is very tough and durable while the ratchet action works very nice and smooth. Having the case to put these bad boys back into when you are done is awesome too, since it helps prevent rust and dry rot from occurring. Simply awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Nicely packaged and very reliable
customer_reviews.text: Nicely packaged and very reliable. Used these for moving from one house to another. No problems at all, and I carried a lot of appliances...
customer_reviews.author: JON

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tie downs
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! Used it for the first time today get get my ZX-10R to the shop. This is a great product and a good value!! You could strap down two dirt bikes with this kit. The iceing on the cake for me is the color!!! Would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Van M.

customer_reviews.title: They are sturdy and the carrying case makes the set perfect for ...
customer_reviews.text: We found that these straps work very well. They are sturdy and the carrying case makes the set perfect for keeping in the truck to have handy whenever needed. Great set for the value. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to use, durable and fast delivery! Customer service follow up to make sure everything is acceptable and that we are happy with our purchase. Super!
customer_reviews.author: Legal Mind

customer_reviews.title: Good working straps
customer_reviews.text: Good straps ratchet worked well with no slips, little case they come in seems kinda cheap and probably won’t last long but I’ll get the use out of it. Seem like good straps tho haven’t used them to secure anything down with yet but I’m sure I’ll be impressed. Another good thing is when you get them you can register them with the website and will have a lifetime warranty
customer_reviews.author: Micheal wagner

customer_reviews.title: So many ways to use/
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly as described. Good quality and so many different ways you can use the straps. I am very excited to use these since I have not used them yet. Went through the package and really liked what I saw!!
customer_reviews.author: rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Eager company with a good product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Perfect set for me - using to tie down 2 kayaks in the bed of a Toyota Tacoma. Case makes it easy to store behind the crew seat. Company follows up to make sure they hit the mark with their service. A nice touch!
customer_reviews.author: C.B. Boston

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great value, bought them as a gift and was surprised at the good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: read headline carefully
customer_reviews.text: good straps but headline said 8 pieces....didn't realize that it was only 4 straps...how would you use only the ratchet part or vice versa without the other part....you basically cant so saying 8 pieces when its actually only 4 straps...maybe you should change that to 9 piece because it does include a carry case.....just not happy with what I paid and only got 4 straps...
customer_reviews.author: jamey l deeter

customer_reviews.title: Quality strap
customer_reviews.text: Really good value for these straps. Wide handle makes them easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! I have used them several times for my tractor and my quads, the loop on the end work out great due to my trailer not having to many hook points. Very well built ! Def will buy more 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Brian young

customer_reviews.title: Strength
customer_reviews.text: I am going on a trip within the month. These tie downs are strong enough to hold anything I decide to take. Sorry, I tried to take a photo but my camera would not let me. Mark
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Dahl

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: good quality, easy to use ( after watching a video online)
customer_reviews.author: movielover

customer_reviews.title: Very sexire
customer_reviews.text: Very high-quality ratchet toe downs. We use for the weights of our trade tent. Works perfectly and secure hold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Straps
customer_reviews.text: Works great I love the HI-Viz green the ratchets feel very strong and durable. moved furniture all day using these never had an issue. And the life time warranty once you register is awesome. Highly recommend you choose these.
customer_reviews.author: J. Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Good quality ratchets straps
customer_reviews.text: These straps are awesome. Very nice made. Good quality ratchet. The soft loops can be attached easy to the awning. And the bright color prevents from falling over it.
customer_reviews.author: Manny F.

customer_reviews.title: Tie downs
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a Christmas gift. He wanted tie downs that didn’t have the usual ratchets. These fit the bill. They were shipped fast and meet the description
customer_reviews.author: melissa butler

customer_reviews.title: Ratchet Tie Down Straps
customer_reviews.text: I have not used these tie down straps yet, but they look to be of good quality and I like the fact that they come in a carrying case. They also came with extenders that help to connect them to the rails inside the moving truck.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonJay C. Customer

customer_reviews.title: Trustworthy
customer_reviews.text: If you don’t need the 15” look at the 10” Found to be rugged and trustworthy. Used twice now for motorcycle transportation. Glad I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Robert plante

customer_reviews.title: Good products for the money
customer_reviews.text: The product started out with a few issues that I was able to correct still a great product for the money
customer_reviews.author: tony c.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Have not had a chance to use them but they look alright. For to keep in my car and tie things down for hurricane season.
customer_reviews.author: Donene McBee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality, Great Value
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Good quality and sturdy. I would recommend for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Rose

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for a recent move. Worked as intended. Great quality. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: KGillespie

customer_reviews.title: The extra included loops are super handy!
customer_reviews.text: Great tie downs and the extra loops are super handy. High quality and solid feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Used several times to hold down EZ UP TENT at a few festivals. Makes everything very secure.
customer_reviews.author: Marietta Cappelletti

product_meta.title: FORTEM Ratchet Tie Down Straps, 4X 15ft Securing Straps, 4X Soft Loops 1500lb Break Strength, Rubber Coated Metal Handles, Plastic Coated Metal Hooks, Carrying Case (Green)
feature_bullets: 4 PACK SET – Contains 4 metal ratchet buckles, 4 heavy-duty hook straps, 4 soft loop straps plus carrier case.
BUILT TO LAST – Hooks are made of weather-resistant stainless steel; high-visibility neon webbing made of sturdy polyester fibers with load capacity of 500 pounds
RESISTANT – Weatherproof to resist rot, mold, and mildew. Spring-loaded release mechanism to prevent ratchets from accidentally opening
CONVENIENT & RELIABLE – 15-foot straps to secure items to your vehicle or to secure items in place in the back of your car
ONE YEAR WARRANTY - Have peace of mind knowing all Fortem products are covered for a full year!
